name: Roast Beef for Fajitas

instructions.en: Place the chuck roast in a slow cooker; season with salt and pepper.
Pour the Figaro Fajita marinade over the roast.
Cover and cook on HIGH for about 1 hour.
Turn to LOW and cook for 6-8 more hours, turning the roast once during cooking time.
Slice, chop or shred the beef.

notes: The number of servings varies. Carb count is negligible before adding toppings. Suggested toppings include saut√©ed green peppers, onions, lettuce, salsa, sour cream, guacamole, and cheese.
